Ogres pack's readme.

Firsst off all select ogre_2 and change Ogre_class (1 - warrior, 2-shaman, 3-berserker).
( Textures have to change manually )


Controls:

to change the combat and normal mode press 1 or 2
(most actions available in combat mode)

moving - directional arrows
attack1 - mouse 1
attack2 - mouse 2
powerattack - mouse 3
defence - p
hit - u
die1 - i
die2 - o



I hope you will enjoy =)
